name: Skooter Skunk
description:
My first completed game ever !

Ride your scooter. Avoid your enemies. There is no end to your struggle. Get the highest score you can.

version 1.0.1 patch notes

- added spacebar as a jump button in addition to the J key

version 1.0.2 patch notes

-added I and K as lane switch buttons in addition to shift and ctrl
